short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Termability displays the Terms of Service of a website in simple language.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Terms of Service are legally binding contracts, but they are also long and hard to understand. While there are solutions on the internet to help people understand terms of service and data privacy, these solutions are not accessible. Termability simplifies Terms of Service into simple language to make them easier to understand. It was designed with members of the Blind, Deafblind, and Partially Sighted communities in mind but can be used by anyone interested in learning more about data privacy online.
